name: Escape it!
description:
Trapped in an ominous garage, surrounded by weird items, a rat is trying to find its way out. An odd smell fills the air... There is no time left! As the room is being filled with deadly gases and the rat’s vision goes blurrier, it needs to find an escape to freedom and understand the cause of it all!

Escape it! is a high-pressure platformer-puzzle game that will mess with your nerves. You play as a rat and you need to solve puzzles and avoid traps and arachnids in order to complete the level, while saving some time because the gas is getting thicker and thicker every second.

Escape it! Was created in 5 days by the Arkanoid team for the FRAxARG 2020 Game Jam.
